name: 24clan Inject Settings
summary: Learn about .ICLAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VPN tunnels allow users to create an encrypted link between their PC or mobile device and an outside network. The user can then browse the Internet while connected to the outside network, so their browsing history is linked to the network's IP address instead of their own.

24clan Inject is a free Android app that allows users to create VPN tunnels using various protocols, including SSH, HTTP, SSL, and WEBSOCKET. Users can then export their VPN tunnel settings in an ICLAN file, for use on other Android devices.

instructions: You can import an ICLAN file into 24clan Inject (Android) and use it to set up a VPN tunnel. To do so:
Open 24clan Inject and select the File icon.
Navigate to and open your ICLAN file.
24clan Inject will then tell you it successfully imported your ICLAN file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
